section.title: occurs
section.para: This rule attribute is used with the isPresent rule attribute to specify the exact number of times a string must be present in the target text. When this rule attribute is not used, then the string must be present in the target text at least once.
For example, the following is valid:
section.programlisting: <unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule isPresent="loja" occurs="2" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>Choose a store option in the online store.</source> <target>Escolha uma opção de loja na loja online.</target> </segment> </unit>

<unit id="1"> <val:validation> <val:rule isPresent="loja" occurs="2" /> </val:validation> <segment id="1"> <source>Choose a store option in the online store.</source> <target>Escolha uma opção de loja na online store.</target> </segment> </unit>
section.para: Value description: A number of 1 or greater.
